summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby to Paul Morris, providing updated information regarding a legal charge of solicitation involving an underage individual. The email includes attachments with background information and images.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is communicating updated information regarding a legal charge to Paul Morris.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the email from Amanda Kirby, receiving updates on the legal situation.

keyFacts: The official charge mentioned is solicitation of someone underage.
The email is classified as confidential and for internal use only.
Amanda Kirby is associated with Deutsche Bank Trust Company.
